Probably something along the lines of:

[code:2m7la4x6]if NOT FLAG ( $getobjectname(#input1#)$_$removeformatting(#object#)$ ) then msg <hi>[/code:2m7la4x6]
But then you could always add AND's, OR's etc...

Posts.EditableText:
Not really.
ASL only allows one comparison per conditional from what I remember.

... Unless you mean with loads of AND's and OR's - which means you can create an endless one with no real challenge.
